channel.title: A Short Question About Making a re-coloured item
channel.description:
Hey, I was just wondering how to make a re-coloured item, i no how to add a new item into a client but i don't no how to make a recoloured version or a different model.
If someone could be as kind as to explain to me i would be very greatful.
Thanks.

item.title: A Short Question About Making a re-coloured item
item.dc:creator: @maul_alert maul alert
item.description:
@maul_alert wrote:

you need your own client.

im new so it might not work…

ok…

open up class8.exe and search for " class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; "

( btw, this s how to add a void knight top )

if you can’t find " class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; ", then search for
" class8.method203(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_183); "

ok, press enter right below that and add this…

(not this)------------------------------------------------(not this)
if(i == 2520){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = -22464;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 4550;
class8.anInt174 = 7215;
class8.anInt181 = 919;
class8.anInt190 = 459;
class8.anInt204 = 138;
class8.anInt169 = 1;
class8.anInt194 = 3;
class8.anInt165 = 7218;
class8.anInt188 = 7217;
class8.anInt200 = 7219;
class8.anInt164 = 7220;
class8.anInt166 = 63;
class8.anInt173 = 120;
class8.aString170 = “Void Knight Top”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “It’s a Void Knight Top”.getBytes();
}

(not this)------------------------------------------------(not this)

after this, compile and run client and go on your server or another that you caan do ::pickup, and you should see it

Read full topic
item.source: A Short Question About Making a re-coloured item
